A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I loved this movie. I like the nuanced look at the force\, moving away from the simple "multimate good vs ultimate evil and you are either all one or all the other\,  which frankly is unrealistic AND has bee beaten to death in fiction\, and how two people can have different experiences of the same event. 

I also enjoyed the character development that took place outside of the main thread. These are interesting people! 

There is some lame stuff\, like the \, oofy bird critters\, and Yoda and Luke being a bit too flip about some things\, but over all\, this was really good. 

Star Wars cane out when I was 10 and really like this new approach.
